article.title: Airbus Group Appoints Harrison as Group General Counsel, De Bausset as President of Airbus Group India
article.abstract: Airbus Group, Amsterdam, Netherlands, has appointed John Harrison as group general counsel and Pierre de Bausset as president of Airbus Group India.
article.text: Airbus Group, Amsterdam, Netherlands, has appointed John Harrison as group general counsel and Pierre de Bausset as president of Airbus Group India.
